      • setMaxChakra

        public final void setMaxChakra(int amount,
                boolean overrideBaseValue)
        Sets the max chakra the player can have
        Parameters:
        amount - what number + maxChakraBonus the max chakra will be NOTE: only works if overridden
        overrideBaseValue - this will use the amount if true, else it will only update the baseChakra + bonus Chakra
